body: Wait! what if In fact there was up until this point in time tens or hundreds or thousands of comments here that mysteriously vanished! What if I'm making a fool of myself! What if this is all a charade!

There was no comments here but now there is a comment where there was once no comment, or should I say: in this place which up until this point in time there was no comments now sits a comment where there was once no comments. who am I kidding! I should just say it how it is: in this place where there was over the duration of many years a stark lack of comments there now at this current point in time sits ( but not in the past and possibly not in the future) a comment, or at least that is how it appears to me in my current state of mind which has so far proven a trustworthy source of information.
